type1_missing.reasoning: Statistics Bar with Total tasks count, Completed tasks count, and Completion percentage not implemented on dashboard

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Session cookie expiry set to current timestamp (no actual expiry) instead of 7 days
Session cookie missing maxAge configuration for 7-day expiry
Tasks sorted by createdAt ASC (oldest first) instead of DESC (newest first) as specified
Task title validation allows max 50 characters instead of 1-100 characters as specified
Registration password validation missing - no client-side check for minimum 6 characters
Login page missing client-side validation for email format
Error responses use inconsistent format - simple strings instead of structured error objects with code and message
Error codes don't match specification - using custom codes instead of specified ones like MISSING_FIELDS, INVALID_EMAIL, WEAK_PASSWORD, EMAIL_EXISTS, INVALID_CREDENTIALS
Password hashing uses 10 rounds instead of default bcryptjs rounds, specification doesn't specify rounds but standard is typically discussed

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Admin dashboard page with user statistics table not mentioned in specification
Priority selector dropdown (low/medium/high) not specified in requirements - spec only mentions task title input
Priority indicator display and color coding not mentioned in specification
Utility function cn() for class merging not specified in requirements
